mapper.select:
select hnt.id as id, hnt.htbah,hnt.lxdz as zl, hnt.buyer as cqr, hnt.buyer as gmr,wa.shrq as zxrq,wa.zxly from house_new_trade hnt left join wf_audit wa on hnt.id=wa.projectid where hnt.iscancel=1 and wa.currentstatus=5
and (hnt.htbah like '%'||#{htbah}||'%' )
and wa.shrq>=to_date(#{ksrq},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and wa.shrq<=to_date(#{jsrq},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by hnt.SYS_UPD_DATE desc
mapper.update: update house_new_trade t set t.CURRENTSTATUS = #{type} WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: update HOUSE_NEW_TRADE t set t.HOUSEID = #{hid} where t.id=#{id}

select t2.xmmc ,t2.JZWMC,t1.mph zh,t.dymc dyh, t.ch,t.mph fh,hnt.* from house_new_trade hnt left join h t on hnt.houseid=t.id left join ljz t1 on t.ljzh=t1.ljzh left join zrz t2 on t1.zrzh=t2.zrzh where hnt.id=#{id}

select h.* from house_new_trade hnt left join (select h.id, h.YCJZMJ,h.YCTNJZMJ,h.YCFTJZMJ, h.FWYT1, ljz.fwjg1,ljz.ZCS,ljz.dscs,0 as dxcs from h left join ljz on h.LJZH = ljz.LJZH union all select utl_raw.cast_to_raw(fg_h.id) id,
fg_h.YCJZMJ, fg_h.YCTNJZMJ, fg_h.YCFTJZMJ, fg_h.FWYT1, fg_ljz.fwjg1, fg_ljz.zcs, fg_ljz.dscs, fg_ljz.dxcs from fg_h left join fg_ljz on fg_h.ljzh = fg_ljz.ljzh) h on hnt.houseid = h.id where hnt.id = #{id}
